name: OpenIV Mod Package File
summary: Learn about .OIV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OIV files are used to distribute mods that modify gameplay, such as models of vehicles. OpenIV can be used to edit, create, and install OIV files.

description: Package used by OpenIV, a versatile editor and installer for games, such as Grand Theft Auto IV and Max Payne 3; contains an .XML file that holds a package description and scripts; may hold a .PNG icon for the mod; similar to a .ZIP archive.
